location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:175 x 160 mm, on sheet 234 x 225 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Dehra Dun. S.D.O. No. 3949-3-25.Distinctive Features:Sketch map of Baghdad and surrounding area produced to illustrate the movements of the British military forces on the 7th March 1917 with position of various brigades and regiments indicated.Same base map as IOR/L/MIL/17/15/72/2, f 11.
